      • TaxRateTable

        public TaxRateTable()
        Default constructor without any extra information.

      • TaxRateTable

        public TaxRateTable(RateTableRow[] table,
                    double exep,
                    int year)
        Constructor with a given table.
        参数:
        table - the tax table
        exep - the exemption of this specification
        year - the year when this table published
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if table is null

      • TaxRateTable

        public TaxRateTable(int nl,
                    double exep,
                    int year)
        Class constructor specifying the number of tax levels.
        参数:
        nl - the number of levels
        exep - the exemption of this specification
        year - the year when this table published

        public void setRow(int row,
                   double leftPoint,
                   double rightPoint,
                   double rate)
        Set the information of a specified row.
        参数:
        row - the line number of the specified row
        leftPoint - the left number of the interval
        rightPoint - the right number of the interval
        rate - tax rate

        Set rate of a row
